Title: Capernaum
Writer: Jihad Hojeily (screenwriter), Michelle Keserwany (screenwriter), Nadine Labaki, Khaled Mouzanar
Actors: Ghida Majzoub, Kawthar Al Haddad, Boluwatife Treasure Bankole, Nadine Labaki
Plot: A politically-charged fable, featuring mostly non-professional actors, about a child who launches a lawsuit against his parents.
